I have the following for sale. Add $2.50 for postage on the first card add .50 for each card after the first. Insurance is optional at your expense.  

Payment by check or money order.  IF you would like to use Paypal it must be sent as a gift or if you have money in your account (no extra charge), if no money in your account add 3%.

All backs Piedmont or Sweet Cap unless otherwise noted. Scans on request.

Thanks for looking.
